title: Hackers Stealing Cars Through Headlight Wiring
description: Ian Tabor's Toyota RAV4 was stolen in April 2022 when thieves hacked the  Electronic Control Unit (ECU) through the headlights. This March 2017 photo shows a RAV4. (Courtesy of Toyota Canada Inc.)

title: ‘Twitter Files’ Reporter Matt Taibbi Leaves Twitter in Protest Over Throttling of Substack Links
description: Journalist Matt Taibbi testifies at the Select Subcommittee on the Weaponization of the Federal Government hearing on “The Twitter Files” in Washington on March 9, 2023, in a still from video. (House Judiciary Committee/Screenshot via NTD)

title: Sales of Used Electric Vehicles Jump by a Third in First Quarter
description: A Tesla Model S charges at a Tesla supercharger station in Cabazon, Calif., on May 18, 2016. (Sam Mircovich/Reuters)
